title: Build Synthesis - Tutorial: Synthesizing a New Codomyrmex Module with synthesize_component_from_spec
description: This tutorial guides you through using the synthesizecomponentfrom_spec MCP tool from the Build Synthesis module to scaffold a new, standard Codomyrmex module structure using a specification and template.
